languages.text: "В основном еретики — рабочие, но некоторые проникли в стражу. Оружие их изготовлено преимущественно из промышленной техники. Культисты лишены колебаний и легко жертвуют собой ради общего блага. Но худшее — их псионическая угроза. Ее мы просчитать не можем".

"The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."
languages.original_text: "В основном еретики — рабочие, но некоторые проникли в стражу. Оружие их изготовлено преимущественно из промышленной техники. Культисты лишены колебаний и легко жертвуют собой ради общего блага. Но худшее — их псионическая угроза. Ее мы просчитать не можем".

traits.locale_text: "The heretics mostly come from the workforce, but some have infiltrated the guards as well. Their weapons are primarily made by repurposing the industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of the common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot calculate it."

The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of the common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot calculate it."

The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

languages.text: “那些异端分子主要由工人组成，但一部分警卫也遭到了他们渗透。他们的武器主要是由工业机械改造而成的。那群邪教徒无所畏惧，愿意为了共同的目标牺牲生命。与此相比，最糟糕的是他们灵能方面的威胁，我们甚至无从估量威胁的程度。”
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子主要由工人组成，但一部分警卫也遭到了他们渗透。他们的武器主要是由工业机械改造而成的。那群邪教徒无所畏惧，愿意为了共同的目标牺牲生命。与此相比，最糟糕的是他们灵能方面的威胁，我们甚至无从估量威胁的程度。”

languages.text: «Los herejes son en su mayoría obreros, pero algunos se han infiltrado también en la guardia. Sus armas se fabrican principalmente reutilizando maquinaria industrial. Los cultistas son intrépidos y están dispuestos a sacrificarse por su objetivo común. Pero lo peor es su amenaza psíquica. Ni siquiera podemos empezar a calcularla».
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes son en su mayoría obreros, pero algunos se han infiltrado también en la guardia. Sus armas se fabrican principalmente reutilizando maquinaria industrial. Los cultistas son intrépidos y están dispuestos a sacrificarse por su objetivo común. Pero lo peor es su amenaza psíquica. Ni siquiera podemos empezar a calcularla».

languages.text: 「異端者たちのほとんどは労働者だが、護衛に潜り込んでいる者もいる。奴らの武器は主に産業機械を再利用して作られている。魔女団は大胆不敵で、共通の目的のためなら自らを犠牲にすることだって厭わない。しかし、最悪なのは奴らの超能力に由来する脅威だ。こちらは、それを推し量ることすらできないのだ」
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちのほとんどは労働者だが、護衛に潜り込んでいる者もいる。奴らの武器は主に産業機械を再利用して作られている。魔女団は大胆不敵で、共通の目的のためなら自らを犠牲にすることだって厭わない。しかし、最悪なのは奴らの超能力に由来する脅威だ。こちらは、それを推し量ることすらできないのだ」

languages.text: « Ils comptent principalement des ouvriers dans leurs rangs, mais certains ont également infiltré la garde, et leurs armes sont pour la plupart constituées d'engins industriels modifiés. Ces cultistes sont prêts à tout et se sacrifieront volontiers pour parvenir à leurs fins... mais le pire est la menace psychique qu'ils font planer et que l'on est encore incapables d'évaluer. »
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

traits.locale_text: « Ils comptent principalement des ouvriers dans leurs rangs, mais certains ont également infiltré la garde, et leurs armes sont pour la plupart constituées d'engins industriels modifiés. Ces cultistes sont prêts à tout et se sacrifieront volontiers pour parvenir à leurs fins... mais le pire est la menace psychique qu'ils font planer et que l'on est encore incapables d'évaluer. »

languages.text: "Die Ketzer bestehen hauptsächlich aus Arbeitern, aber einige haben die Reihen der Wachen infiltriert. Ihre Waffen sind größtenteils improvisiert, aus den Teilen industrieller Maschinen hergestellt. Die Kultisten kennen keine Furcht, sie sind jederzeit bereit, sich für ihr gemeinsames Ziel zu opfern. Doch das Schlimmste ist ihre psychische Bedrohung. Wir können uns das Ausmaß gar nicht klarmachen."
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."

Doch das Schlimmste ist ihre psychische Bedrohung. Wir können uns das Ausmaß gar nicht klarmachen."

languages.text: "Kâfirler, yoğunlukla işçilerden oluşuyor ancak muhafızlar arasına sızanlar da mevcut. Silahları, aslen kullanıma uygun hâle getirilen sınai makinelerden yapılma. Tarikatçılar, korku nedir bilmiyorlar ve ortak davalarının iyiliği için kendilerini feda etmeye hazırlar. En kötü kısmı ise teşkil ettikleri ruhsezi tehdidi. Bu tehdidin kapsamını ölçemiyoruz bile."
languages.original_text: "The heretics mostly consist of workers, but some have infiltrated the guard as well. Their weapons are primarily made from repurposed industrial machinery. The cultists are fearless and will readily sacrifice themselves for the sake of their common goal. But the worst part is their psychic threat. We cannot even begin to gauge it."
